Phi Theta Kappa Honors Society - Member

Native Spanish Speaker with a Degree in Drama/Theater. Graduated with Honors in Drama in Colombia S.A. Spanish Instructor at Le Tutor Language Academy since 2012, teaching from beginners to advanced levels.  My drama and theater background have given me remarkable people skills which I use on my Teaching and Interpreting/Translating work. I personally have a real passion for helping others.I have study Photography at Mesa Community College for the past 2 years and have been member of  Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society for the past 3 years an International Organization that recognizes the efforts of Honor Students around the world. The passion for what I do shows in my every day work.

Graduated with honors and awarded with a scholarship at the Drama School. Worked at the National Colombian TV stations: "Caracol TV"​, "RCN Television"​, "Punch TV"​,"Cempro TV"​,"TV Cine"​, among others. First performance on film was still in South America with "La gente de la Universal" by Felipe Aljure./Recently moved to Arizona were have been nominated and awarded ( 2007 / 2008)  for performing  in Theatrical productions and Film. Recently continue building up my acting skills by joining Fia Cova Arts Academy as an acting instructor,Fia Cova Academy is an organization based in Phoenix, Arizona which is focused on producing outstanding artistic projects.

Claudia Rubio, a magnificent talent behind and in front of the camera, her skills as professional actor have delighted theatre crowds as well as movie goers with her performances. summary: Owner and Event Organizer at  Hollywood Style Photo Booths. www.hollywoodstylephotobooths.com Professional Actor, Photographer - Spanish Instructor- Interpreter/Translator - English – Spanish/ Spanish – English. Native Spanish SpeakerWho doesn’t love a little entertainment at their Corporate Event, B-day Celebration or Wedding Reception? While you’re off taking your own photos as a married couple, why not provide your guests with a fun activity that will have people laughing and goofing off all night. A photo booth is the perfect solution! I just launched my Photo Booth on April 2014 and the business started running by itself. The guests from the first event were so happy that referred my Photo Booth to their friends. This is definitely the best addition to any event! My acting and photography Skills come all together in the creation of this super fun Photo Booth! Here is a little more about me:   I am a native Spanish Speaker with a Degree in Drama/Theater. Graduated in Drama in Colombia S.A. I am Spanish Instructor at Le Tutor Language Academy since 2012, teaching from beginners to advanced levels. My drama and theater background have given me remarkable people skills which I use on my Teaching and Interpreting/Translating work. I personally have a real passion for helping others.I have study Photography at Mesa Community College for the past 2 years and have been member of Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society for the past 3 years an International Organization that recognizes the efforts of Honor Students around the world. The passion for what I do shows in my every day work.
name: Claudia Rubio
title: Entrepreneur - Owner of Hollywood Style Photo Booth Interpreter/ Translator - Native Speaker - Actor / Photographer
